item.description:
THE MAY 12TH MEETING IS ON!

Hope to start some plans for scooter rides at the next meeting.

Meeting will take place rain or shine, but only only if 3 or more RSVP, this group is nothing but wheels with out the brains to make it happen.

I will also need to collect dues at this meeting, I've been footing the meetup costs up till now - meetup charges $19 a month. It's pretty simple, the more people that show the lower the dues per person.

Hope you see you there!

Paul
item.name: The Boston Scooter May Meetup
